attributes.action: Make the banks give the money they were given onto the taxpayer
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The banks were given a big sum of money in 2008 and have kept it to themselves. This petition is to try and get the money to the British taxpayer who deserves to get it.

This petition is part of a Year 9 school project on the Credit Crunch. This petition will end on the 13th July.
